title: What happens when economy experiences deflation

content.question: If an economy is experiencing deflation, which of the following is most likely to happen?

choices.label: People consume more in the present.
People who took a fixed-rate loan become worse off.
The real interest rate is lower than the nominal interest rate.

content.answer: People who took a fixed-rate loan become worse off.
